desc: Home of Peak Pride, Unicorns.LIVE, FruitCake, QUSIC, Unicorn Booth (photobooth). We are a broadcasting, events based company in Kelowna BC. 100% LGBT2Q+ owned (LGBT, Gay).

layout.text: Join us August 5th for one night birthday bash in honour of the Okanagan's blonde bombshell. Expect drag, dancing, roasts and more.
